story.text: LOS ANGELES (Hollywood Reporter) - Jamison Jones has landed a recurring role as the head of the Secret Service on the upcoming season of the Emmy-winning Fox drama "24." Jones ("Hollywood Homicide") will next be seen in the feature "He Was a Quiet Man." ----- ----- ----- ----- ----- ----- LOS ANGELES (Hollywood Reporter) - Singer-songwriter Van Morrison, "The Departed" screenwriter William Monahan and "Hotel Rwanda" writer-director Terry George will be honored by the US-Ireland Alliance at its second annual Oscar Wilde: Honoring Irish Writing in Film event at the Wilshire Ebell in Los Angeles on February 22. Al Pacino will present the award to Morrison, who will perform. Actress Roma Downey will host. Reuters/Hollywood Reporter
